memberdef.name: loadA
memberdef.initializer: { u8 u = (v); reg.a = u; reg.sr.n = u & 0x80; reg.sr.z = u == 0; }

memberdef.name: loadX
memberdef.initializer: { u8 u = (v); reg.x = u; reg.sr.n = u & 0x80; reg.sr.z = u == 0; }

memberdef.name: loadY
memberdef.initializer: { u8 u = (v); reg.y = u; reg.sr.n = u & 0x80; reg.sr.z = u == 0; }

memberdef.name: READ_FROM_ADDRESS
memberdef.initializer: if (likely(rdyLine)) reg.d = read<C>(HI_LO(reg.adh, reg.adl)); else return;
